Room.Name: Temple Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a secret passage deep inside the Uland Temple.
Room.LongDescription: There is a peep hole on the north wall of the passage. Looking through it will reveal the main chamber of the temple, with the altar directly to the north. On the south side of the passage there used to be an opening which is now blocked by a fallen stone. Looks like it allowed light from outside to fall on the altar, but for what purpose?
